00023 bool GenericValue::isSameType ( const GenericValue &second ) const
00024 {
00025     return getTypeID() == second.getTypeID();
00026 }
00027 
00028 ValueBase::~ValueBase() {}

00030 
00031 const ValueConverterMap &ValueBase::converters()
00032 {
00033     return Singletons::get<_internal::ValueConverterMap, 0>();
00034 }
00035 
00036 const ValueBase::Converter &ValueBase::getConverterTo( unsigned short ID )const
00037 {
00038     const ValueConverterMap::const_iterator f1 = converters().find( getTypeID() );
00039     assert( f1 != converters().end() );
00040     const ValueConverterMap::mapped_type::const_iterator f2 = f1->second.find( ID );
00041     assert( f2 != f1->second.end() );
00042     return f2->second;
00043 }
00044 bool ValueBase::convert( const ValueBase &from, ValueBase &to )
00045 {
00046     const Converter &conv = from.getConverterTo( to.getTypeID() );
00047 
00048     if ( conv ) {
00049         switch ( conv->convert( from, to ) ) {
00050         case boost::numeric::cPosOverflow:
00051             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Positive overflow when converting " << from.toString( true ) << " to " << to.getTypeName() << ".";
00052             break;
00053         case boost::numeric::cNegOverflow:
00054             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Negative overflow when converting " << from.toString( true ) << " to " << to.getTypeName() << ".";
00055             break;
00056         case boost::numeric::cInRange:
00057             return true;
00058             break;
00059         }
00060     } else {
00061         LOG( Runtime, error )
00062                 << "I dont know any conversion from "
00063                 << MSubject( from.toString( true ) ) << " to " << MSubject( to.getTypeName() );
00064     }
00065 
00066     return false;
00067 }
00068 
00069 bool ValueBase::fitsInto( short unsigned int ID ) const
00070 {
00071     boost::scoped_ptr<ValueBase> to;
00072     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( ID );
00073 
00074     if ( conv ) {
00075         return ( conv->generate( *this, to ) ==  boost::numeric::cInRange );
00076     } else {
00077         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00078                 << "I dont know any conversion from "
00079                 << MSubject( toString( true ) ) << " to " << MSubject( getTypeMap( true, false )[ID] );
00080         return false; // return an empty Reference
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 ValueBase::Reference ValueBase::copyToNewByID( short unsigned int ID ) const
00085 {
00086     boost::scoped_ptr<ValueBase> to;
00087     const Converter &conv = getConverterTo( ID );
00088 
00089     if ( conv ) {
00090         switch ( conv->generate( *this, to ) ) {
00091         case boost::numeric::cPosOverflow:
00092             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Positive overflow when converting " << MSubject( toString( true ) ) << " to " << MSubject( getTypeMap( true, false )[ID] ) << ".";
00093             break;
00094         case boost::numeric::cNegOverflow:
00095             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Negative overflow when converting " << MSubject( toString( true ) ) << " to " << MSubject( getTypeMap( true, false )[ID] ) << ".";
00096             break;
00097         case boost::numeric::cInRange:
00098             break;
00099         }
00100 
00101         return *to; // return the generated Value-Object - wrapping it into Reference
00102     } else {
00103         LOG( Runtime, error )
00104                 << "I dont know any conversion from "
00105                 << MSubject( toString( true ) ) << " to " << MSubject( getTypeMap( true, false )[ID] );
00106         return Reference(); // return an empty Reference
00107     }
00108 }
